comments.body: does this test for num columns < 1000 and > 1000?

This test was only for 1000 columns. There are other test for smaller number of columns.
Anyway, I decided to add parametrized test checking the spacing for various number of columns (``test_info_verbose_with_counts_spacing``), so that it is more clear how the spacing should work.

    header = " #     Column  Dtype  \n---    ------  -----  "
    assert header in res
